subject: Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Ernie Accorsi was convinced that Eli Manning, a young quarterback from Ole Miss who was the son and brother of N.F.L. quarterbacks, would lead the Giants to a championship.
snippet: Ernie Accorsi was convinced that Eli Manning, a young quarterback from Ole Miss who was the son and brother of N.F.L. quarterbacks, would lead the Giants to a championship.
